entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InstallVisualStudio.ps1 pulls wrong Windows SDK version #36165
  • Meta Issue - Data Protection keyring sync/creation race investigation #36157
    .NET 7 Planning
  • HttpLoggingMiddleware is overly aggressive at redacting headers #36156
    6.0-rc2
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, mvc #36150
  • Razor Diagnostic Enhancements #36144
  • IntelliSense bug for Razor Components #36143
  • ApiExplorer is useless #36140
  • Blazor webassembly AuthorizeView component is very slow on page loading #36139
  • [BLAZOR WASM] Lagging textarea binding with large amount of text #36138
  • Pipe should complete with exception if WebSockets closed prematurely #36137
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Single file build time regression: proxy-yarp #36136
  • Blazor - RuntimeError: memory access out of bounds #36135

Closed

  • Add support for stating accepts/consumes metadata is required or not #35849
    6.0-rc2
  • ProtectKeysWithCertificate cannot find self-signed certificates #12068
    Next sprint planning
  • Investigate Selenium Upgrade #36048
  • The remote certificate is invalid according to the validation procedure #36052
  • Not able to receive values from Route and Body in a POST call #36063
  • Startup improvement: json #36015
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_ef #36082
  • HttpSysException : Failed to accept a request. #35892
    6.0-rc2
  • When creating an OpenAPI client with a space in the project name, then NSWAG fails. #28441
    Next sprint planning
  • 1 #36142
  • Exception when running tests for an app that uses Minimal APIs #35990
    6.0-rc2
  • Add & publish a cm.1 file for each .rpm we ship #35725
    6.0-rc2
  • CheckPasswordAsync throws The input is not a valid Base-64 string #36096
  • Startup improvement: plaintext #36106
  • Minimal API does not start HostedService before accepting requests #35454
    6.0-rc2
  • Huge delay between code change and error reporting #27665
    Razor.Tooling

PullRequests

Created

  • Mitigate quarantined test failures #36167
  • Have kestrel filter out pseudo headers #36166
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Unquarantine tests #36163
    area-runtime
  • Dispose the prior response on retry #36162
    area-runtime, feature-httpclientfactory, 7.0-preview1
  • Move OpenAPI extensions to routing assembly #36161
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `2e63715` to `f9741d3` #36158
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] React to dotnet/runtime#57816 #36155
    area-infrastructure
  • Add analyzer for detecting mismatched endpoint parameter optionality #36154
    area-infrastructure
  • Honor ThrowOnBadRequest setting for wrong content type log #36152
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0] Avoid using static NullabilityInfoContext #36145
    area-web-frameworks
  • Jmprieur/fix web api templates #36130
    area-mvc, community-contribution, feature-templates
  • [release/6.0] Add nullable support to BindAsync #36128
    area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Update ChromeDriver version #36107
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Add support for stating accepts/consumes metadata is required or not #36153
    6.0-rc2
  • Add support for stating accepts/consumes metadata is required or not #35875
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • New Hosted build pools #36110
    area-infrastructure, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] Properly reject non-json FromBody parameter binding #36118
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] Handle ERROR_CONNECTION_INVALID after ERROR_MORE_DATA #36147
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc2
  • Handle ERROR_CONNECTION_INVALID after ERROR_MORE_DATA #36146
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Update gitattributes to fix bootstrap CDN SRI #36131
    area-mvc, 6.0-rc2
  • Avoid using static NullabilityInfoContext #36112
    7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Create .rpm's for Linux Mariner #36111
    area-infrastructure, 6.0-rc2
  • Create .rpm's for Linux Mariner #36094
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Run user defined hosted services before the server starts. #36133
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc2
  • Store and reuse health status for health checks #36102
    Perf, area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] HTTP/3: Support canceling requests that aren't reading a body #36109
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc2
  • Run user defined hosted services before the server starts. #36122
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Update gitattributes to fix bootstrap CDN SRI #36115
    7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Improve error messages for missing body and services #36064
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
  • Delay closing SignalR connections on shutdown #34438
    area-signalr
  • Add an analyzer that warns about non-literal sequence numbers #35805
    area-infrastructure
  • Warn that UseStartup/Configure/ConfigureWebHost not supported on WebApplicationBuilder #35884
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Retarget DOTNETHOME when installing x64 on ARM64 #36100
    area-infrastructure
  • [WIP] Bootstrap v4 support #35981
    area-identity
  • [Blazor] Update npm dependencies #36088
    area-blazor
  • [SignalR] Add Http options to Negotiate metadata #36078
    area-signalr
  • Add nullable support to BindAsync #36114
    area-web-frameworks
  • Use ArrayPool as default pool fallback #35719
    area-runtime
  • Support binding to form and form file parameters in minimal actions #35158
    community-contribution, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • Update Program.cs #36103
    area-mvc
  • [Static web assets] Fix casing issues during parsing #35564
    area-mvc
  • Add minimal option to webapi template #36068
    area-mvc
  • Add code generation for setting Blazor component parameters #36074
    area-blazor, area-razor.compiler
  • Fix Blazor Server Reconnection Mechanism #36126
    area-signalr, area-blazor
